name: Bash Scripting Standards
description: Enforces Bash scripting best practices and shellcheck compliance. Based on language-standards.md
author: Promptcraft

rules.message: Scripts must have appropriate shebang line (#!/bin/bash or #!/bin/sh)
Bash scripts should use snake_case with descriptive names (e.g., backup_files.sh)
Consider using 'set -euo pipefail' for strict error handling
Never hardcode secrets, passwords, or API keys in scripts. Use environment variables or secure credential management.
